src:
Srbi dobri u prvoj pobedi Sakramenta [VIDEO]
02 Nov 2019, 09:26 by Milos
Sakramento – Juta 102:101(28:18, 23:30, 30:32, 21:21)
Sakaramento Kingsi savladali su Jutu Džez u glavnom gradu Kalifornije i upisali prvi trijumf u njihovom šestom meču od starta sezone.
U izjednačenoj utakmici, Kingsi su došli do pobede 2.9 sekunde pre kraja. Nemanja Bjelica je uputio šut za tri poena, lopta je bukvalno ispala iz koša, ali je priskočio Herison Barns i poentirao.
Bjelica je meč završio sa 11 poena (4/8) i šest uhvaćenih lopti. Bogdan Bogdanović je zabeležio 14 poena (5/8), dva skoka i jednu asistenciju.
Najefikasniji kod pobednika bio je Dieron Foks sa 25 poena, pet skokova i četiri asistencije, dok je Badi Hild upisao 18 koševa.
U ekipi Jute istakli su se Donovan Mičel sa 24 poena, Majkl Konli sa 19, Bojan Bogdanović 17, i Rudi Gober, koji je uz 15 koševa imao i 16 skokova.




POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Serbs good in Sacramento first victory [VIDEO]
02 Nov 2019, 09:26 by Milos
Sacramento - Jute 102: 101 (28:18, 23:30, 30:32, 21:21)
The Sacaramento Kings defeated Utah Jazz in the California capital and registered their first triumph in their sixth match since the start of the season.
In the even game, the Kings came in with a win of 2.9 seconds before the end. Nemanja Bjelica shot a three-point shot, the ball literally fell out of the basket, but Herison Barnes came in and scored.
Bjelica finished the match with 11 points (4/8) and six catches. Bogdan Bogdanovic recorded 14 points (5/8), two rebounds and one assist.
The most efficient winner was Dieron Fox with 25 points, five rebounds and four assists, while Buddy Hild scored 18 points.
The Utah team featured Donovan Mitchell with 24 points, Michael Conley with 19, Bojan Bogdanovic 17, and Rudi Gober, who also had 16 rebounds with 15 points.
